name: uncomfortably
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
C1 in a way that does not feel comfortable and pleasant: I was warm but not uncomfortably so. She lay awkwardly on her back, shifting uncomfortably, unable to sleep.
C1 in a way that makes you feel slightly embarrassed, or that shows that you feel slightly embarrassed: She glanced away uncomfortably, staring down at her plate. I smiled uncomfortably while he processed my information. See
uncomfortable
More examplesFewer examplesThe room was uncomfortably chilly. I've found myself sharing rooms where the beds are uncomfortably close. Prices are rising uncomfortably fast throughout the developed world.
